name: epiphenomenal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to an epiphenomenon (= something that exists and can be seen, felt, etc. at the same time as another thing but is not related to it): This evidence has been dismissed as epiphenomenal by academics.epiphenomenal to We should not present cultural change as epiphenomenal to economic development. Related word
epiphenomenon
More examplesFewer examplesPeople often treat religion and culture as epiphenomenal.This effect may be accidental or epiphenomenal, because earlier studies showed it to be insignificant.He believes that political life, rather than being central to identity, is essentially epiphenomenal.
